summary: Completed comprehensive testing of PRODIGY AI e-learning platform. Backend APIs are fully functional (100% success rate). Frontend core flows work but has critical modal overlay issue blocking navigation after certain actions.

ui_bugs.issue: Modal dialog overlay intercepts pointer events preventing navigation clicks
ui_bugs.selector: div[data-state='open'] with class 'fixed inset-0 z-50 bg-black/80'
ui_bugs.impact: Users cannot navigate between pages after certain actions (like class creation)
ui_bugs.reproduction: Create class or perform certain actions, then try to navigate - clicks are blocked by invisible overlay

design_issues.issue: Mobile menu button not clearly identifiable

passed_tests: Backend API authentication (signup/login for both roles)
Backend assignment management (create, get, submit, grade)
Backend announcements, AI chat, file upload
Frontend user signup flows (teacher and student)
Frontend core UI rendering and styling
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix critical modal overlay issue: There's a dialog overlay (div[data-state='open']) that remains open and blocks all navigation clicks. This prevents users from navigating between pages after performing certain actions like class creation. The overlay has 'fixed inset-0 z-50' positioning and intercepts pointer events. Need to ensure modals close properly or implement proper modal state management.

success_percentage.frontend: 70% (core flows work, navigation blocked by modal overlay)
